page.title: 12SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: CONCERN IS FELT BY THE INHABITANTS THAT THE ROYAL AIR FORCE ARE TAKING THEIR LOW FLYING EXERCISES SO SERIOUSLY IN THE AREA. PARTICULARLY ON CLEAR, SUNNY DAYS, HIGH-SPEED JETS ROAR ACROSS THE SKY AND SEEM SO LOW THAT THEY CAN BE TOUCHED. THE TARGET FOR THE JETS IS THE RIVER WYE WITH ITS DISTINCTIVE BRIDGES THEY FLY BELOW THE MOUNTAIN PEAKS AND FRIGHTEN THE PONY TREKKERS ALTHOUGH THE SHEEP HAVE NOW BECOME USED TO THEM AND HARDLY PAUSE IN THEIR GRAZING. WINDOWS RATTLE AND OLD PEOPLE MUTTER AS THE JETS HURTLE ALONG THE VALLEY - A LOW FLYING TRANSPORT PLANE IS ALSO A REGULAR VISITOR TO THE AREA. IT WAS NOTED WITH SOME AMUSEMENT THAT THE VERY REGULAR FLY PASTS CEASED ALMOST ENTIRELY DURING THE RECENT PARLIAMENTARY BY ELECTION.
